pages.text: $(li)Paper is a thin and maleable sheet material.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with Sugar Cane, Banana Frond, Small Banana Frond, Large Banana Frond, Red Mushrooms, or Brown Murshtooms.
$(li)Cartographers will exchange you this item by Emeralds.$(br)$(li)Paper can be used to craft multiple items too.

$(li)Crimson Lanterns$(li)Paper Lanterns$(li)Patterns$(li)Pet Bandages$(li)Empty Maps$(li)Notice Boards$(li)Paper Walls$(li)Ancient Shelfs$(li)Camdies$(li)Trapped Books$(li)Presents$(li)Cartography Tables.
